# searchMenuTemplate

**Instance Property**

The menu object used to dynamically construct the search field’s pop-up icon menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var searchMenuTemplate: NSMenu? { get set }
```

## Related Documentation

- **Search Fields**

## Managing Menu Templates

- **clearRecentsMenuItemTag**: The menu item for clearing the current set of recent string searches in the menu.
- **noRecentsMenuItemTag**: The menu item that describes a lack of recent search strings.
- **recentsMenuItemTag**: The location of recent search strings in the “recents” menu group.
- **recentsTitleMenuItemTag**: The menu item that provides the title of the menu group for recent search strings.

items.description: The menu item for clearing the current set of recent string searches in the menu.
